subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: When Louisville’s Kevin Ware broke his leg, Luke Hancock immediately knelt beside his teammate and tried to offer comfort, a display of leadership that the team has come to expect.
snippet: When Louisville’s Kevin Ware broke his leg, Luke Hancock immediately knelt beside his teammate and tried to offer comfort, a display of leadership that the team has come to expect.
